item.title: Running TOR on Kali | The proper way
item.description: A short guide on running the Tor Browser safely by creating a non‑root user and launching Tor under that account, ensuring it never runs with elevated privileges.

item.title: Setting up OpenVPN on Kali
item.description: A straightforward walkthrough for configuring OpenVPN on Kali or Debian by placing the provider’s certificates and config files in /etc/openvpn, setting up credential handling, enabling DNS updates, and configuring the service to auto‑start so the VPN connects reliably at boot.
